title: Boy, Ekko needs a hot fix.
body: I don't think I can last until next patch. This champion has so many problems. Lets just start with his insane shield and ult ratio. Like seriously anything with a 1 to 1 ratio is strong. But 130%? Release Reksai building full damage and destroying was frustrating but this Kid can get bot lane doubles and turn around fights with his eyes closed.

While I do agree he needs a nerf. I don't think nerfing his ult is the right approach if he uses his ult for damage he wastes his only safe means of escape. You can also see where his ults gonna land making it predictable and so counterable. It also takes a bit of setting up so it's not easy to land. The right approach would probably be to nerf the duration of his passive slow and speed, possibly also nerf the power. It's really a strong hidden power that people don't really notice because you just look at his absurd ult scaling while his passive just lies there and dealing a lot of damage.

Ulting grants hp, mobility, insane aoe damage, and a set up for your op 2 second aoe stun. If you don't think his ult is powerful and is fine you're crazy. Sure you can mess up and SOMETIMES not be able to escape for whatever reason. But Ekko is becoming the jack of all trades. Insane turn around, damage, cc, you name it. Sure you can "see his clone" but it wont stop everyone from chasing him or someone else that is low. Everything but his Q has problems. This is what you expect from a "utility assassin" something that should never even be on the table for even 1 second. This is all my opinion but I would be shocked if we did not get something nerfed soon.

I think people don't put enough value into counterplay each and everone of his abilities has counterplay exept his e, which is completely ok because it is an escape. His q deals minimum damage if you only get hit by the first one, his w has a clear cast time if you have vision and is easily dodged. His Ult has significant counterplay, because if he uses it for damage he is leaving himself open to be killed easily and you can predict where it's coming. He has a healthy kit with clear strenghts and clear weaknesses. But he is overtuned and should be nerfed. I just don't think nerfing his ult will make him balanced just rather clunky.

People are comparing Ekko to release-Zyra.

60+% winrate, whenever she ult'ed it was basically a pentakill. She was so overpowered that Riot had to fix her two days later, far before they wanted to release the next patch.

Ekko can dodge damage with: 
First part of E 
Second part of E
Shield
Invulnerability during ult 
TP to clone from ult

Ekko allows people to play recklessly and get away with it simply because they can press R. They know they'll be able to kill someone without even needing that 500 base magic damage with 1.3AP ratio AOE ult with a heal. 

Let's think about this for a second, even if Ekko's ult didn't heal him, that amount of damage scaling and utility in itself would have been broken. 
Let's compare this to Leblanc's ult with distortion which has 450 base magic damage with .9 ap ratio at level 3. Not only does Ekko's ult have a larger AoE, ap ratio, base damage, it also heals him. Oh yes, let's not forget that his ult also costs NO MANA.

Ekko is definitely hot fix bad. I will not play against him anymore. AFK any game I'm matched against him. It's just not fun. Riot needs to stop making champions that teleport. Teleporting is too strong. Flash is already broken enough. If anything stuff like flash should be taken out of the game, not added more often.

Im not saying Ekko is bad, but I seriously feel the need to ask why champions get released in such piss poor states. Im really confused how they can let a champion get to live servers with huge balance problems with what I hope is all the testing they do to them before hand.

I feel like Ekko's creation was rushed even though it took 8 months. Some champions are perfectly fine like Lux, Twisted Fate, and Amumu. Some champions seem a bit stronger than others like LeBlanc, Katarina, and Yi. Some champions feel a lot less developed than others like Evelynn Poppy and Taric(shade thrown). I just feel like Ekko falls a different spot. He isn't like Katarina where his damage is absurd but his kit isn't as bad. Both his kit and damage is absurd. There is no need for him to possess that much utility and damage. He doesn't even need a support to peel for him. He can do it himself. I think Riot should mini rework him before this gets out of hand. He also should be disabled in ranked. It is clear that he isn't balenced.
